mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(title, content, user_id, created_at) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT board_tb.*, user_tb.username, FORMATDATETIME(board_tb.created_at, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS createdAtFormat FROM board_tb INNER JOIN user_tb ON board_tb.user_id = user_tb.id ORDER BY board_tb.created_at DESC;
